contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Zora|zora}} '''Zora''' may refer to: *[[Zora (given name)]] *''Zora'', a genus of spider in the ''[[Zoridae]]'' family *[[Zoras]], a fictional race in ''The Legend of Zelda'' series *[[Zora, Pennsylvania]], the site of a Civil War skirmish near [[Monterey Pass]] *''The Red Zora'', a German children's book by Kurt Kläber ([[The Outsiders of Oskoken Castle]]) *[[Zora Lancaster]], a character played by Allisyn Ashley Arm on ''Sonny With a Chance'' * [[Zora Arkus-Duntov]] (1909–1996), Belgian-born American engineer whose work on the Chevrolet Corvette earned him the nickname "Father of the Corvette" *[[Zora (vampire)]], the Italian comic book erotic character * Zora, the pseudonym of trip-hop artist Larry Hansen ==See also== * Zhora, a [[List of Blade Runner characters|character in ''Blade Runner'']] {{disambig}}
